label: Outdoor Gear
description: Products and equipment for outdoor activities such as hiking, walking, and trekking.
intents: Find lightweight and durable footwear for hiking and walking.
Track fitness and performance while engaging in outdoor activities.
Find waterproof and weather-resistant gear for outdoor activities.
Find gear and equipment for mountaineering and trekking.
Find reviews and recommendations for outdoor gear and equipment.

subcategories.label: Hiking and Walking Footwear
subcategories.description: Footwear designed for hiking and walking on various terrains.

subcategories.label: Fitness Tracking Devices
subcategories.description: Devices for tracking fitness and performance during outdoor activities.

subcategories.label: Weather-Resistant Gear
subcategories.description: Gear designed to withstand various weather conditions during outdoor activities.

subcategories.label: Mountaineering and Trekking Gear
subcategories.description: Gear and equipment for mountaineering and trekking.

subcategories.label: Reviews and Recommendations
subcategories.description: Reviews and recommendations for outdoor gear and equipment.
